meanings.definition: A musical interval consisting of three whole tones.
meanings.sent1: The song sounded unique with the tritones playing in the background.
meanings.sent2: The musician played a beautiful melody using tritones in the composition.
meanings.sent3: The tritones in the music made everyone start dancing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: Her voice hit the tritones of emotion, resonating deeply with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The tritones added a mysterious and haunting quality to the music.

meanings.definition: A chord consisting of three whole tones.
meanings.sent1: The tritones in the chord created a sense of tension and dissonance.
meanings.sent2: The jazz pianist played a complex piece using tritones in the chords.
meanings.sent3: The tritones in the chord clashed like two stubborn goats but somehow sounded harmonious.
meanings.sent4: His words struck the tritones of truth, leaving a lasting impact on the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The tritones in the chord added a layer of depth to the music.
